question_text: Which of the following may indicate a failing motherboard? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Built-in audio and Ethernet fail simultaneously
Sudden shutdowns with no error messages
Incorrect date and time after reboot
Touchscreen doesn't work in one application
correct_answer: Built-in audio and Ethernet fail simultaneously
Sudden shutdowns with no error messages
Incorrect date and time after reboot
explanation: Failing motherboards may cause onboard component failures, spontaneous shutdowns, and CMOS-related symptoms like time resets.
